tool_description: An API that displays recent cybersecurity news articles from relevant news sites around the world.
name: Cybersecurity News
title: Cybersecurity News

api_list.name: Get Singular Cybersecurity News Article
api_list.description: Returns a singular cybersecurity news article.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cybersecurity-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cybersecurity-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cybersecurity-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspageid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cybersecurity-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Cybersecurity News Articles
api_list.description: Returns all articles dealing with cybersecurity.
